channel.title: Misalignment on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Misalignment on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 10, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on AI risks, including misalignment, misuse, and s-risks, and an exploration of emergent misalignment due to prompt sensitivity in LLMs.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 29, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on AI governance strategies to avoid extinction risks, discussing catastrophic risks from misalignment, misuse, and geopolitical conflict, and the need for urgent research into governance mechanisms.
